node.title: The Fed chair could face a grilling at his confirmation hearing. Here’s what to watch.
node.alt: “We know that high inflation exacts a toll, particularly for those less able to meet the higher costs of essentials like food, housing and transportation,” Jerome H. Powell will tell lawmakers on Tuesday.
node.description: Jerome H. Powell, the Federal Reserve chair, will testify before lawmakers as he seeks Senate confirmation to a second term.
node.content: ["Jerome H. Powell, the Federal Reserve chair, will testify before members of the Senate Banking Committee on Tuesday as he seeks confirmation for a second term as head of the world\u2019s most powerful central bank.", "Mr. Powell, whom President Biden has nominated to a second four-year stint, could face tough questions from lawmakers at a complicated economic juncture and as an ethics scandal dogs the institution he leads.", "Here\u2019s what to watch."]
